fr.n7.stl.block.ast

Interface Type

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CoupleType, RecordType
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArrayTypeImpl, AtomicType, CoupleTypeImpl, FunctionTypeImpl, NamedTypeImpl, PointerTypeImpl, RecordTypeImpl, SequenceTypeImpl

    public interface Type
    Gathers the common services provided by types. Must be implemented by all the classes representing types in the language.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean compatibleWith(Type _other)
      Check if two types are compatibles.
      boolean equalsTo(Type _other)
      Check if two types are equals.
      int length()
      Compute the size in TAM words needed to store a value of the _self type.
      Type merge(Type _other)
      Builds a new type that results from the merging of self and _other according to the compatibleWith relation.

    • Method Detail

      • equalsTo

        boolean equalsTo(Type _other)
        Check if two types are equals. This must be an equivalence relation.
        Parameters:
        _other - The other type (with respect to self).
        Returns:
        True if the type is equals with the type _other, False otherwise.

      • compatibleWith

        boolean compatibleWith(Type _other)
        Check if two types are compatibles. A subtype is compatibleWith a supertype, but a supertype is not compatible with a subtype. This must be a partial order relation. Check that the self type is compatible with the _other type, i.e. all values of self can be used as a value of _other.
        Parameters:
        _other - The other type
        Returns:
        True if the types are compatibles, False otherwise.

      • merge

        Type merge(Type _other)
        Builds a new type that results from the merging of self and _other according to the compatibleWith relation. Compute the least common type (least upper bound) of two types according to the compatibleWith relation. TA.merge(TB).compatibleWith(TA) and TA.merge(TB).compatibleWith(TB).
        Parameters:
        _other - The other type.
        Returns:
        A type that is the least upper bound of self and _other according to compatibleWith.

      • length

        int length()
        Compute the size in TAM words needed to store a value of the _self type.
        Returns:
        Number of TAM words needed to store a value of the _self type.
